title: Late afternoon sighting by motorist on I-675 near Beavercreek
observed: About two weeks ago while driving on I-675 northbound inside Greene co, coming toward Dayton, Ohio I looked in a corn field. I observed a dark-colored figure in the middle of the field, the top of the head, was dark gray and black, long dark hair. It stood between seven feet and eight feet in height, slim built.The time of day was around 1630 hours, cloudy, the temp. was up around seventy.the date ,was 06-01-02.
